title: Ingress routing failure in AKS cluster
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Ingress controller misconfiguration caused intermittent routing failures
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer reports intermittent 502 errors when accessing services via Application Gateway
msdfm_resolution: Reconfigured Traefik ingress rules and validated backend health probes

title: Application Gateway SSL handshake timeout
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Expired SSL certificate in Key Vault caused TLS handshake errors
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer reported inability to reach public-facing endpoints
msdfm_resolution: Renewed certificate in Key Vault and updated gateway listener configuration

title: Private Link access denied to Key Vault
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Network ACLs blocked Private Endpoint subnet from resolving DNS to Key Vault
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer reported secret retrieval failures from workloads in AKS
msdfm_resolution: Adjusted Key Vault network ACLs and DNS zone linkage for Private Endpoint resolution

title: High latency between AKS nodes and ACR
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Unoptimized registry SKU and network routing led to high image pull times
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer reported slow pod startup due to image pull delays
msdfm_resolution: Migrated ACR to Premium SKU and established VNet integration with AKS subnet

title: Firewall blocking outbound traffic to Azure Monitor
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Firewall outbound rules misconfigured for monitoring endpoints
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer reported missing logs and metrics in Azure Monitor
msdfm_resolution: Updated network rules to allow outbound traffic to Azure Monitor and Prometheus endpoints

title: Node pool autoscaling failure in AKS
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Cluster autoscaler not recognizing available subnet IP ranges
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer observed pods stuck in Pending state during scale-out events
msdfm_resolution: Expanded subnet IP address range and restarted AKS autoscaler components

title: Azure Bastion connection timeout
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Public IP of Bastion host was not correctly associated with management subnet
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer unable to connect to virtual machines using Bastion service
msdfm_resolution: Re-associated Bastion host to correct subnet and validated NSG configurations

title: Internal load balancer health probe failure
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Incorrect probe path and port caused backend pool unhealthy status
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer noticed service downtime within internal application network
msdfm_resolution: Updated probe configuration to match application health endpoints and verified backend responses

title: Prometheus metrics ingestion lag
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Managed Prometheus workspace experiencing high ingestion latency under burst load
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer observed delays in metric updates in dashboard
msdfm_resolution: Scaled workspace ingestion capacity and optimized scrape intervals

title: Hybrid VPN Gateway packet loss
msdfm_rootcausedescription: Intermittent on-premises routing instability caused packet drops over IPSec tunnel
msdfm_customerstatement: Customer reported poor connectivity between on-prem and Azure workloads
msdfm_resolution: Reconfigured VPN policies and adjusted BGP routes for stable connectivity
